alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 31 at 1:48PM CDT until November 02 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee, West Feliciana, East Feliciana, St. Helena, Washington, Northern Tangipahoa and Northern St. Tammany Parishes. In Mississippi, Pearl River County. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana
